title: America's Remote Learning Crisis | Russell Westbrook
itunes:title: America's Remote Learning Crisis | Russell Westbrook
description:
Parents and kids grow impatient about reopening schools, Trevor presents a biography of Tucker Carlson, and NBA superstar Russell Westbrook talks about his Why Not? Foundation and more.


To help fight food insecurity in Texas resulting from recent snowstorms, go to dailyshow.com/HoustonFoodBank.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
